rComments: Possibly the hottest teacher I've ever had. Not only that but he was damn good at his job. I absolutely adore this man. He gets very into the class and the readings and is incredibly intelligent. I had a lot of interesting conversations with him and he taught me a lot. If you just ask him for help he will definitely help and you will do well.

Very good teacher, obviously will not be an "easy" A, but if you do the things he tells you to do you will be just fine. A good teacher and extremely knowledgeable. If you take his class, be prepared to write a several papers.

Phillip was an excellent TA. He knew the material and explained it well while using his humor to keep the class active. We also got to watch Boohbah one day, haha. I definitely recommend taking his class. Plus, he's hella' attractive.

Cool guy. He takes attendance every class. But the majority of class is spent watching clips from movies. The course consists of two papers, a midterm, a final, and weekly quizzes over the movie of the week. It's nothing unmanageable, I didn't do much and somehow ended up with an A-.
One of the harsher grading teachers. His prompts are overly complicated too, but you will become a better by the end. Not a hard class, just not the "easy A" most RHET 105 classes are
